Key Match Events: The Cavaliers lost to the Chicago Bulls in an overtime game 139-137.
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Kenny Atkinson emphasized the importance of cleaning up some things before the regular season.
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Kenny Atkinson stated that the 0-4 preseason record is not great, but they have a clean slate for the regular season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Donovan Mitchell had 22 points, Darius Garland had 23 points, Jarrett Allen had 25 points and 16 rebounds, and Evan Mobley had 15 points, 10 rebounds, and 8 assists in the game.
Others: Max Strus will miss at least six weeks due to an ankle injury.
